name: Think you know TV characters? Online Trivia | TV for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.correct: The Suite Life of Zack and Cody
questions.explanation:
The Suite Life of Zack and Cody.

	Bob is the twins' dyslexic classmate. Barbara is a classmate and also Cody's girlfriend. Kurt is their dad.

That's So Raven.

	William and Larry are Cory's friends. Tanya is Raven and Cory's mother.

Lizzie McGuire.

	Claire is Kate's 'best friend' but mainly her posse. Larry Tudgeman is the biggest geek at school and Oscar is Matt's friend.

Hannah Montana.

	Lola is Lilly's disguise name.  Lilly is Hannah's best friend. Traci is another celebrity who has sinus problems and talks weird. Max is one of Jackson's friends.

options: The Suite Life of Zack and Cody
questions.explanation:
The Latest Buzz.

	There are five main characters on the show. They are Rebecca, Noah, Amanda, Wilder and Michael.

Naturally Sadie.

	Ron is the nerd in the show. Jane is Sadie's role model and Hal is her brother.

Phil of the Future.

	Debby is the annoying girl in Pim's class. Tia is Keely and Phil's friend and Seth is another part of the gang.

Zoey 101.

	Chase likes Zoey but he's afraid to tell her. Dustin is Zoey's little brother. Dana appeared in season 1.

Recess.

	Randall is the snitch. Ashley is Spinelli's real name and there are also four Ashleys who are very annoying to the six. Gus's real name is Gustoff.

The Replacements.

	Kay is Todd and Riley's mom. Abbey is Riley's friend and Acobo is Todd's friend.
